programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep50
programme.desc: Koto, Plain And Tall - Julien is lost in the jungle and accidentally saves a Mountain Lemur named Koto who turns out to be the biggest threat the kingdom has ever faced

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep24
programme.desc: Stayin' Alive - Allura returns to the Balmera to gather a giant crystal when a familiar foe reawakens

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep50
programme.desc: My Big Fat Gran Wedding / The Strutting Edge - After being called out for having commitment issues by Grug, Gran decides to make the ultimate commitment: marrying Mow!; After embarrassingly choking at the prior Valley's beastie Pageant, Eep asks previous winner Gran to train her to be the best

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep24
programme.desc: Lucky And The Patchwork Plan - Lucky and her friends try to prevent Aunt Cora from leaving Miradero.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep24
programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep24
programme.desc: Mad About Madagascar - The Wanderers travel to Madagascar to get fresh vanilla for Wizard Flamb. Odlulu is already there; using the Bouncy-Bounce Key to build an ice cream parlor up in a Baobab tree! Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.

programme.title: Olivia Ep47
programme.desc: Olivia Explores Outer Space - Olivia is assigned to do a school project based on one of the planets in the solar system, but they're all so interesting, she just can't decide which one! With a little help from her brother Ian, she finds a solution: create a model of the entire solar system, and maybe even discover a brand new planet in the process

programme.title: Olivia Ep48
programme.desc: Olivia Goes To The Beach - When Grandma takes Olivia and Ian to a special beach, they're all shocked to find that Grandma's old friend Annette has built a huge fence blocking the best part of the beach. They don't let that stop them from having a good time. Soon with Olivia's prompting, even Annette wants to join in on the fun.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep47
programme.desc: Big Chris Gets Lucky - Big Chris realises that he only ever has good luck when he has his lucky mascot with him. But what happens when he loses it on race day?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep48
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Fun Run - Roary and Plugger really want Big Chris to take part in the fun run but Big Chris isn't so sure. Can they make sure he trains for it without even realising?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep21
programme.desc: Why Rhino Charges - You see there was a time when Rhino didn't charge and he couldn't see very well at all. Poor old Rhino really wanted to be invited to the Dance of the Horns up on the plains with Buffalo and all the other horned animals. But Rhino didn't have a horn, so he wasn't allowed. The Monkeys decide to help Rhino and make him a horn from a piece of old wood. But when Rhino wakes up he doesn't know what it is. Aargh! Thing on the end of my nose! CHAAaarge!' And that's Why Rhino Charges. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep22
programme.desc: Why Caterpillar Is Never In A Hurry - You see Caterpillar was never in a hurry. When all the animals were racing around Tinga Tinga getting ready for the Best-dressed parade, Caterpillar was happy to sit in a tree and munch on leaves saying Po-le, po-le, slowly, slowly, good things come to those who wait'. Then one day the rains come and Caterpillar disappears into a cocoon. What's happening?' questions Elephant. Wait and see' says Tortoise wisely Wait and See'. Then Caterpillar transforms into the most beautiful butterfly ever!... But who wins the Best-dressed parade? Tales from Africa

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep19
programme.desc: Rodney the Hero / Club Shed - When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe hes a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesnt go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis backyard.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep19
programme.desc: Tag Team / Cattitude Adjustment - With a new family moving to town, Mayor Sniffington wants Pawston to look perfect. Tag and Scooch offer to help, but it's too many chores to do on their own, so Tag builds a robot to help. But when Frank and Beans catch wind of the robot, they try to swipe it so that it will do their personal chores. \ When Tag learns that Pawston's new fire chief is a cat, she leads a welcoming effort with the dogs of Pawston. But when their attempts to welcome Tom and Kit Whiskerton go awry, Tag realizes it's because they're only doing things that dogs would enjoy.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep19
programme.desc: Bees - Puss is terrified by an invasion by a swarm of bees, which only the hippy-like Piper can control with her magic flute.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive's Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep6
programme.desc: Poison in the Pit of the Plum - When Po and the kids stop for the night at an Inn, they meet a gang who wants to fight Po and end up down a path to uncovering Jindiao's evil plan

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep19
programme.desc: The Zippleback Experience - After heroes Hiccup and Toothless save Barf and Belch's life, the grateful Zippleback tries to repay its life debt and abandons riders Ruff and Tuff

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep19
programme.desc: That's Sooo Rob - Juliens former BFF, Rob, returns to lure the king away from his royal responsibilities and back to his crazy partying days.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep11
programme.desc: Salty and Sweet / Cruz Blues - Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isnt good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what hes feeling.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep14
programme.desc: Dew Drops Day Off / Up All Night - When the Dew Drops have the day off, they discover their families still need their help when theyre not around. / Harper needs a good nights sleep before her first day of Cooking Camp. But when an overtired Nicholas keeps her awake, the Dews must help keep Nicholas quiet, even if it takes all night.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep19
programme.desc: Treasure Riders - When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep19
programme.desc: Rodney the Hero / Club Shed - When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe hes a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesnt go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis backyard.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep19
programme.desc: Tag Team / Cattitude Adjustment - With a new family moving to town, Mayor Sniffington wants Pawston to look perfect. Tag and Scooch offer to help, but it's too many chores to do on their own, so Tag builds a robot to help. But when Frank and Beans catch wind of the robot, they try to swipe it so that it will do their personal chores. \ When Tag learns that Pawston's new fire chief is a cat, she leads a welcoming effort with the dogs of Pawston. But when their attempts to welcome Tom and Kit Whiskerton go awry, Tag realizes it's because they're only doing things that dogs would enjoy.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep12

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep125
programme.desc: The Trip to the Moon - Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Pancakes / S'Mores - Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. // Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep315
programme.desc: Paddington's Race Against the Storm / Paddington's Super Snail - Judy finds her inner hero when a storm hits on a Rangers Camping trip, and they need to shelter from the weather // Paddington befriends a speedy snail, who is so fast she has a heroic future ahead, but why does she look so sad?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep304
programme.desc: Paddington's Rainbow Race - Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of a rainbow after they break Baaz's kaleidoscope.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep614
programme.desc: The Tiger Treasure - Blaze, AJ, and Stripes put their explorer skills to the test as they follow the trail to the fabled Tiger Treasure

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep722
programme.desc: Moto Pups: Pups save the Donuts / Moto Pups: Pups save the Kitties - The Ruff-Ruff Pack steals Mr. Porter's Mini-Donut Maker, the Moto-pups set off to get the machine back. // Ruff-Ruff Pack takes over Humdinger's lair his kitties. Now the Moto Pups and Wild Cat must rescue Mayor Humdinger's precious felines.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep720
programme.desc: Moto Pups: Pups vs The Ruff-Ruff Pack - The Motorcycle Stunt Show comes to town - bringing famed stunt cyclist Wildcat, and the trouble-making cyclists, the Ruff-Ruff Pack. Wildcat joins the Paw Patrol to help stop the baddies from trashing the town!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep724
programme.desc: Moto Pups: Pups Save A Sneezy Chase - Chase's cat allergies lead him to the desert, and he's trapped with the Ruff-Ruff Pack. The Moto-Pups gear up for an epic rescue!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep117
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Observatory / The Crew Builds A Zipline - The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! // After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail. But Rubble & Crew, finds a construction solution.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep118
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Library Tea Shop / The Crew Builds A Dance Floor - Construction on the first Builder Cove library is abuzz with bees! This calls for an extra sweet constuction solution. / Grandpa Gravel teaches Charger all his best moves for the big dance contest. But will a runaway disco ball cost them first place?

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Alebrije Adventure / Let's Get A Paleta - Ale the Alebrije asks Dora for her help! The Alebrije tree is wilting, so it's up to Dora to find its rainbow water. // On a super hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Val's paleta truck is stuck! Dora goes to rescue her and get paletas for everyone.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep226
programme.desc: Saltwater Studios / Sand Crabby - When Baby and his friends are asked to perform at a music festival, they can't decide which genre of song to play. // Detective Baby Shark and William Watson solve a crabby mystery.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep225
programme.desc: Finloose / Operation Ernie - When dancing is outlawed in Carnivore Cove, Baby Shark will do whatever it takes to get the town dancing again! // Baby and William try to help Ernie make a best friend.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep204
programme.desc: Bubbles - Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Bedtime - Its nearly time for bed and Peppa and George are called in for their bath. After that, they brush their teeth and get into bed. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy and Daddy Pig finally sit down, but its been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep206
programme.desc: The Traffic Jam - Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep207
programme.desc: Rock Pools - Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They all have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep113
programme.desc: King - In Teletubbyland, Dipsy is King. Tinky Winky delivers Tubby Custard and Tubby Toast to King Dipsy - whatever King Dipsy wants! Luckily for Tinky Winky they soon swap places.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Beans - Dee encourages a friend to say beans and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Frightful Friend - Plom is having a spooky sleepover for his friends at his house. But when Zip gets scared and decides to stay home, Plom tries to show him that scary things can sometimes be fun things too.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Messy-morphosis - Messy monster can't find his caterpillar friends. The garden bush where he left his friends is now covered with pretty butterflies. But where did the caterpillars go? He flutters off to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep69
programme.desc: Waiting Games - When Gran tells Monty that good things come to those who wait, he wonders how it could possibly be better to wait for something than to have it right away.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Library - When Muffin is told that she is special by her dad, she interprets it as an excuse to do anything she wants, which means playing Bluey and Bingo's game of library her way.

programme.title: Kronologi Zayn Rayyan (New)
programme.desc: Bernama TV menerbitkan Augmented reality (AR) kes kematian kanak-kanak autisme, Zayn Rayyan Abdul Matiin, 6, yang dibunuh pada Disember 2023 di Damansara Damai, Selangor. AR ini menceritakan kronologi dari mula kejadian ini berlaku sehingga kepada penahanan kedua ibu bapa Zayn Rayyan pada 31 Mei 2024. Setelah ditahan reman 13 hari, Zaim Ikhwan Zahari dan Ismanira Abdul Manaf yang kedua-duanya berumur 29 tahun menghadapi pertuduhan mengabaikan kanak-kanak berkenaan dengan cara kemungkinan menyebabkan kecederaan fizikal terhadapnya. Pasangan itu mengaku tidak bersalah selepas pertuduhan terhadap mereka dibacakan dan minta dibicarakan. Mahkamah menetapkan 26 Julai 2024 sebagai tarikh sebutan semula kes. Bagaimanapun, kes pembunuhan ini telah menimbulkan pelbagai pendapat dan spekulasi daripada orang awam yang masih menunggu agar pelaku sebenar ditangkap dan menerima pengadilan di mahkamah.

programme.title: Kronologi Zayn Rayyan (Rpt)
programme.desc: Bernama TV menerbitkan Augmented reality (AR) kes kematian kanak-kanak autisme, Zayn Rayyan Abdul Matiin, 6, yang dibunuh pada Disember 2023 di Damansara Damai, Selangor. AR ini menceritakan kronologi dari mula kejadian ini berlaku sehingga kepada penahanan kedua ibu bapa Zayn Rayyan pada 31 Mei 2024. Setelah ditahan reman 13 hari, Zaim Ikhwan Zahari dan Ismanira Abdul Manaf yang kedua-duanya berumur 29 tahun menghadapi pertuduhan mengabaikan kanak-kanak berkenaan dengan cara kemungkinan menyebabkan kecederaan fizikal terhadapnya. Pasangan itu mengaku tidak bersalah selepas pertuduhan terhadap mereka dibacakan dan minta dibicarakan. Mahkamah menetapkan 26 Julai 2024 sebagai tarikh sebutan semula kes. Bagaimanapun, kes pembunuhan ini telah menimbulkan pelbagai pendapat dan spekulasi daripada orang awam yang masih menunggu agar pelaku sebenar ditangkap dan menerima pengadilan di mahkamah.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Bad Blood - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep902BlachowiczvsAdesanya
programme.desc: At UFC 259, middleweight champion Israel Adesanya stepped up in weight as he sought a second belt taking on newly minted light heavyweight champion Jan Blachowicz. See both men train and prepare for their battle for 205-pound gold

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep704
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Origins: Kayla Harrison, Fighter Focus: Jim Miller, Ultimate Access: Chute Boxe, Day 1: Cody Garbrandt - Olympic Judo world champion Kayla Harrison details her transition into MMA, revealing her resilience through childhood abuse, and channeling her pain into athletic triumphs. The UFCs marathon man looks back at this record-breaking career and details his approach to the fight game that has seen him compete at the sports highest level for decades. Exclusive access to a special ceremony held at the original site of the Chute Boxe academy where Charles Oliveira is awarded his black belt by Chute Boxe founder Rudimar Fedrigo. Former Bantamweight champion Cody Garbrandt looks back at the impressive UFC debut performance that launched his decorated career.

programme.title: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA
programme.desc: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA - More than a title-winning machine, Pep Guardiola changed the face of football. Trace the evolution of his famed tiki-taka style of play that propelled the likes of Messi, Xavi, Iniesta and Busquets to footballing royalty.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC300PereiravsHill
programme.desc: Over 30 years in the making, UFC celebrates its 300th numbered event with 3 title fights and a stacked card. Alex Pereira defends his Light Heavyweight belt againt former champ Jamahal Hill, Zhang Weili puts her Strawweight title on the line against Yan Xiaonan in the first ever UFC China vs China championship bout, and Justin Gaethje battles Max Holloway to keep his coveted BMF belt. Catch all this and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep4
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep15
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1002UsmanvsCovington2
programme.desc: UFC 268 was headlined by the heated rematch between welterweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and Colby Chaos Covington. Relive their incredible battle with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep902BlachowiczvsAdesanya
programme.desc: At UFC 259, middleweight champion Israel Adesanya stepped up in weight as he sought a second belt taking on newly minted light heavyweight champion Jan Blachowicz. See both men train and prepare for their battle for 205-pound gold

programme.title: Highlights 2024 WorldSBK - Prosecco DOC UK Round
programme.desc: Highlights 2024 WorldSBK - Prosecco DOC UK Round - Back to where it all began for WorldSBK, the famous Donington Park circuit has hosted countless classics in its time as a World Superbike venue. From 1988, the circuit has hosted 52 races and made memories each year for a variety of reasons. Set in the gorgeous Leicestershire countryside, the circuit twists and turns through the scenery, to the soundtrack of thousands of cheering fans, year-in, year-out.

programme.title: 2023-2024 KOVO V-League Women - Round 5: Red Sparks vs Hillstate
programme.desc: Round 5: Red Sparks vs Hillstate - The 20th season of the KOVO V-League Women sees reigning champions EX Hi-pass defend their title against six fellow professional volleyball teams for the coveted championship in South Korea.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep903VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC and reigning featherweight champion, Alexander Volkanovski defends his title against Jiu-Jitsu savant, Brian T-City Ortega at UFC 266. See both men train and prepare to fight for the UFCs 145-pound title.

programme.title: Highlights 2024 WorldSBK - Czech Round
programme.desc: Highlights 2024 WorldSBK - Czech Round - Autodrom Most first appeared on the WorldSBK calendar in 2021 and has become an instant classic due to its quirky layout leading to incredible late-race fights. Thanks to its attractive event line-up, it is a popular destination for many motor enthusiasts and their families from across Europe. The track was completed in 1983 as a part of restoration of coal mine lands and it became the first permanent motor racing complex in what was then Czechoslovakia. Motorcycle racing has long tradition there, from club trainings to International championships.

The track was completed in 1983 as a part of restoration of coal mine lands and it became the first permanent motor racing complex in what was then Czechoslovakia. Motorcycle racing has long tradition there, from club trainings to International championships.
